comments: Great professor. She is smart, funny, attractive, and knows her stuff. The course content can be confusing at times but she is happy to answer questions and is very helpful.

she uses the same slides and tests as lyons, but is much nicer and better looking. However for some of the lectures she doesnt know what she is talking about and has been corrected on several occasions. In some instances actually made the material more difficult to understand...
Very good knowledgeable and nice teacher. She should be the head of the information security professors in the university.
